in response to yesterday's historic Congressional vote that narrowly ratified the controversial proposal to wipe out the last remains of the so-called Zombie Wars, which drew to a dramatic end with the US military suffering massive casualties and being forced to retreat as Vegas was walled off with the zombies left inside to haunt the abandoned city.

This will mark the culmination of the president's efforts to fulfill his campaign promise to exterminate Las Vegas' undead population by taking the extreme action of dropping a low-yield tactical nuclear bomb on the city of Las Vegas in four days' time, coinciding with sunset on the Fourth of July holiday.
